definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: The content of allantoin in Rhizoma Dioscoreae was determine by HPLC method.
sentences.chinese: 采用HPLC测定麸炒山药中尿囊素的含量。

sentences.english: These are derived from wild yams and soybeans.
sentences.chinese: 天然黄体酮萃取自野生山药和豆科植物。

sentences.english: Objective To study the cryopreservation technique of Dioscorea opposita germplasm resources by vitrification.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究怀山药种质资源的玻璃化超低温保存技术。

sentences.english: The nutrient content was analysed in Jipi Chinese Yam.
sentences.chinese: 对菏泽鸡皮山药营养成分进行了系统分析。

sentences.english: ConclusionDioscored opposita Thunb. polysaccharide possesses a potential effect of immune regulation.
sentences.chinese: 结论淮山药多糖具有一定的免疫功能增强作用。

sentences.english: It illustrated the superiority of the processing by microwave in producing Chinese yam complete powder.
sentences.chinese: 说明微波处理在山药制全粉的优越性。

sentences.english: New yam, peeled, scraped clean and washed, cut into Ding-shaped stand.
sentences.chinese: 新颖山药去皮，刮洗洁净，切成小丁状待用。

sentences.english: Fried rice, Sparerib soup with yam, Orange.
sentences.chinese: 扬州炒饭，排骨山药汤，橘子。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the quality of Rhizome Dioscorea in different producing areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较研究不同产地怀山药的质量。

sentences.english: The Chinese yam may make many kinds of cooked foods, bears the transportation to store, also may process does the product.
sentences.chinese: 山药可做多种菜肴，耐运输贮藏，又可加工成干制品。

sentences.english: The extraction technology of polysaccharide from Dioscorea was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对鲜山药中水溶性粗多糖的提取工艺进行了研究。

sentences.english: Results The results showed that Dioscorea opposita Thunb. polysaccharide was significant to Con A induced mice Lymphocyt…
sentences.chinese: 结论淮山药多糖具有一定的免疫功能增强作用。

sentences.english: Common yam rhizome porridge treats short breath and weak physique.
sentences.chinese: 气短体虚弱，煮粥加山药。

sentences.english: In 2010, Lichuan yam was selected as the special product for the Shanghai World Expo.
sentences.chinese: 2010年利川山药被选定为上海世博会专供产品。

sentences.english: Yam anthracnose is an important disease for the crop Diascorea opposite Thunb.
sentences.chinese: 山药炭疽病是山药上的重要病害。

sentences.english: Yam anthracnose is an important disease for the crop Diascorea opposite Thunb.
sentences.chinese: 山药炭疽病是山药上的重要病害。

definition: Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 雞頭米|鸡头米[ji1 tou2 mi3]
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
grains of Job's tears plant 薏苡[yi4 yi3]
Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
